verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H6213>Make<s%> thee <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>; of a whole <S%H4749>piece<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> them: that thou mayest <S%H1961>use<s%> them for the <S%H4744>calling<s%> of the <S%H5712>assembly<s%>, and for the <S%H4550>journeying<s%> of the <S%H4264>camps<s%>.

And when they shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> with <S%H2004>them<s%>, all the <S%H5712>assembly<s%> shall <S%H3259>assemble<s%> themselves to thee at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>.

And if they <S%H8628>blow<s%> but with <S%H259>one<s%> trumpet, then the <S%H5387>princes<s%>, which are <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, shall <S%H3259>gather<s%> themselves unto thee.
When ye <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm<s%>, then the <S%H4264>camps<s%> that <S%H2583>lie<s%> on the east <S%H6924>parts<s%> shall go <S%H5265>forward<s%>.

When ye <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%>, then the <S%H4264>camps<s%> that <S%H2583>lie<s%> on the south <S%H8486>side<s%> shall take their <S%H5265>journey<s%>: they shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> an <S%H8643>alarm<s%> for their <S%H4550>journeys<s%>.
But when the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> is to be gathered <S%H6950>together<s%>, ye shall <S%H8628>blow<s%>, but ye shall not sound an <S%H7321>alarm<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>; and they shall be to you for an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

And if ye <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6862>against<s%> the enemy that <S%H6887>oppresseth<s%> you, then ye shall blow an <S%H7321>alarm<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>; and ye shall be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and ye shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%> from your <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

Also in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, and in your solemn <S%H4150>days<s%>, and in the <S%H7218>beginnings<s%> of your <S%H2320>months<s%>, ye shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> over your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%>, and over the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of your peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%>; that they may be to you for a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass on the <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> day of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> from off the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>took<s%> their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> out of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>; and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>rested<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran<s%>.
And they <S%H7223>first<s%> took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

¶ In the <S%H7223>first<s%> place <S%H5265>went<s%> the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies<s%>: and over his host was <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> was <S%H5417>Nethaneel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> was <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon<s%>.

And the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was taken <S%H3381>down<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%>, <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies<s%>: and over his <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> was <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> was <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1845>Deuel<s%>.

And the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%>, <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>: and the other did set <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> against they <S%H935>came<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies<s%>: and over his <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was <S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> was <S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%>, which was the <S%H622>rereward<s%> of all the <S%H4264>camps<s%> throughout their <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: and over his <S%H6635>host<s%> was <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5996>Ammishaddai<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> was <S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ocran<s%>.
And over the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> was <S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan<s%>.
Thus <S%H428>were<s%> the <S%H4550>journeyings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies<s%>, when they set <S%H5265>forward<s%>.

¶ And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2246>Hobab<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7467>Raguel<s%> the <S%H4084>Midianite<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> father in <S%H2859>law<s%>, We are <S%H5265>journeying<s%> unto the <S%H4725>place<s%> of which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it you: <S%H3212>come<s%> thou with us, and we will do thee <S%H2895>good<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, I will not <S%H3212>go<s%>; but I will <S%H3212>depart<s%> to mine own <S%H776>land<s%>, and to my <S%H4138>kindred<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5800>Leave<s%> us not, I pray thee; forasmuch as thou <S%H3651%H3045>knowest<s%> how we are to <S%H2583>encamp<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, and thou mayest be to us instead of <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.
And it shall be, if thou <S%H3212>go<s%> with us, yea, it shall be, that what <S%H2896>goodness<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3190>do<s%> unto us, the same will we <S%H2895>do<s%> unto thee.

¶ And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%>: and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5265>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them in the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%>, to search <S%H8446>out<s%> a resting <S%H4496>place<s%> for them.
And the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was upon them by <S%H3119>day<s%>, when they went <S%H5265>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And it came to pass, when the <S%H727>ark<s%> set <S%H5265>forward<s%>, that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Rise <S%H6965>up<s%>, <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and let thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> be <S%H6327>scattered<s%>; and let them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee.
And when it <S%H5117>rested<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7725>Return<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, unto the <S%H7233>many<s%> <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
